landing.title: Memory Match Mobile
landing.subtitle: Wasan Kimantawa na Hankali
landing.description1: Memory Match Mobile wasa ne mai sauÆ™i na tunani na hankali wanda ke gwada tunani na ji da tunawa. Aikace-aikacen yana kunna jerin sautuka, sannan ya Æ™alubalanci masu amfani don gano sautunan da suka ji bayan É—an jinkiri. Matakin wahala yana daga sautuka 2 zuwa 7.
landing.description2: An tsara shi azaman aikace-aikace mai sauÆ™i wanda ke aiki da inganci ko da a yankunan karkara masu Æ™arancin haÉ—in intanet, aikace-aikacen yana gudana gaba É—aya a cikin burauzar ku tare da Æ™arancin amfani da bayanai. Ana adana duk bayanan aiki a cikin na'urarku don cikakken sirri, yana sa ya zama mai sauÆ™in shiga ga al'ummomi a duk duniya ba tare da la'akari da Æ™untatawa na ababen more rayuwa ba.
landing.feature1Desc: Yi motsa jiki da ikon ganowa da adana bayani na É—an lokaci.
landing.feature2Desc: Yi amfani da sautunan duniyar gaske don Æ™arfafa Æ™warewar kulawa da sauti.
landing.feature3Desc: Kowane zama, adadin sautuka yana Æ™aruwa - har inda za ku iya zuwa?
landing.disclaimer: Ku tuna, a matsayin ma'aikacin waya, ba ku ne abokin ciniki ba! Aikin ku shine ku lura da sautuka, ba amsa waya ba ğŸ“±

game.title: Memory Match Mobile ğŸ®

game.selectionTitle: ZaÉ“i Duk Sautunan Da Kuka Ji
game.selectionInstruction: Ku danna kan kowane sauti da kuka ji a cikin jeri:
game.clearConfirm: Kana tabbata kana so ka share duk zaman? Ba za a iya mayar da wannan ba.
game.ageHint: Shekaru suna taimaka wajen ba da shawarar matakin wahala daidai
game.noSessions: Babu wani zama da aka yi rikodin har yanzu
game.suggestedFor: An ba da shawara don shekaru
game.expertMessage: Kun kai mafi girman matsala! Mafi kyawun masu wasa ne kawai suke zuwa nan.
game.veryhardUnlocked: ğŸ’ An BuÉ—e Matakin Da Wuya Sosai!
game.veryhardMessage: Aiki mai kyau sosai! Kuna matsawa zuwa matakan Æ™alubale.
game.adaptiveDifficulty: Ci gaba ta Atomatik na Wahala
game.adaptiveDifficultyHint: Tsallake sakamako a 100%, ci gaba zuwa matakin na gaba
game.nextTestHigherDifficulty: Gwaji na gaba zai yi amfani da mafi girman wahala
game.maxLevelHint: Majiyyaci ya Æ™ware matakin mafi wahala
